thread.title: Amy B
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Amy B

author: Amy B
title: Amy B
text: The 80% discount is real and the downloads were immediate! The ebooks look good! I was skeptical at first and I still don't understand why the 80% discount site is totally different from Kayla's own site. It's not mentioned anywhere on her facebook page either. I am not sure if this is really her site or if someone has stolen her work and reselling it. Hopefully not the latter. But I can't afford the same ebooks sold on her website. Maybe Kayla should mention this discount site on her facebook page if it is legit to make people feel more comfortable in purchasing.
